title: [Medicine] Singaporean scientists develop innovative magnetic gel that heals diabetic wounds three times faster in diabetic mouse model. First-of-its-kind cell therapy promotes wound healing, improves overall wound health and lowers risks of recurrence, and in turn, lower the incidents of limb amputations.

[Medicine] Two probiotics identified as promising hypertension treatments. Blood pressure in hypertensive mice returned to healthy levels after treatment with Bifidobacterium lactis and Lactobacillus rhamnosus. The study highlights how gut microbiota can regulate blood pressure.
